about_the_game:
*This product is a bundle of DLC characters at a discounted price.
*This product is a special bundle of DLC characters, including those scheduled for release in the future.
Each character included in this product will be available for download separately after release. Please refer to the following for the release schedule.
*In order to use this content, the Base Game (sold separately) is required. You may need to apply the latest patch before using this product.
*Each DLC character included in this product will also be available to purchase separately when they release. Please be aware of this when making your purchase.

[Product Contents]
- KOF XV DLC Character "SHINGO YABUKI"
- KOF XV DLC Character "KIM KAPHWAN"
- KOF XV DLC Character "SYLVIE PAULA PAULA"
- KOF XV DLC Character "NAJD"
- KOF XV DLC Character "DUO LON"
- KOF XV DLC Character "HINAKO SHIJO"

name: KOF XV Fighter Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
